duties_responsibilities.duty: Triage, assess, and treat patients of all ages presenting for emergency care
Document pertinent nursing notes, administer medications, and respond to incoming telephone calls
Coordinate and triage incoming ambulance traffic and manage care with primary ED attending
Educate patients regarding their medications, procedure, and treatments, providing support throughout their stay

education_certification.credential: Graduate from an accredited school of Nursing: Associate's Degree in Nursing or higher is required, with a current Registered Nurse license and required certifications (BLS, ACLS, PALS)
